org.openftc.revextensions2

Class ExpansionHubEx

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.hardware.lynx.LynxCommExceptionHandler
      • org.openftc.revextensions2.ExpansionHubEx
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareDevice

    public class ExpansionHubEx
extends com.qualcomm.hardware.lynx.LynxCommExceptionHandler
implements com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareDevice
    Provides an implementation of the REV Expansion Hub's features that are not included in the standard FTC SDK.

      • setServoPulseWidth

        public void setServoPulseWidth(int port,
                               int uS)
        Set the pulse width output of a servo port directly, rather than using the -1 to 1 range from the SDK
        Parameters:
        port - the servo port to set the pulse width of
        uS - the pulse width (in uS) to set the above servo port to
